nodes.text: Rella was a Human female with short brown hair. She was the right-hand-woman, as well as lover, of Arwen Cohl. She was killed in a skirmish on Eriadu when the Nebula Front  , by order of Eru Matalis (who at the time went by the alias Havac), turned against Cohl at the Eriadu Trade Summit in 33 BBY. Captain Cohl survived the skirmish and was determined to avenge her death, tracking the man responsible down.
